effect.name: Color Shift
effect.description: Taking a greyscale image, a start color, and an end color, map the greyscale pixels from the source image to an appropriate color between the start (black) and end (white) colors.

parameter.name: Black Color
parameter.description: The color corresponding to pure black pixels in the source image.

parameter.name: Grey Color
parameter.description: The color corresponding to grey (RGB == 0.5) pixels in the source image.

parameter.name: White Color
parameter.description: The color corresponding to pure white pixels in the source image.

parameter.name: Offset
parameter.description: The offset of the shift in the range [0.0, 1.0]. This is added to the value of the source pixel. This will wrap in the event of an overflow or underflow.
